titleStmt.title: Bo-peep, or The jerking parson catechising his maid ; a pleasant ballad to the tune of Notcrof's delight.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Belman of Algate by order of the Ward,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "VVhen Oliver that imp of Mars".
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
